root.name: Tokimeki Memorial 4
root.description: Just like the other ones it is an dating game where you, the main character has three years ( years 7-9) to get a girl. There are many choices and who you will be ended up with depends on your decisions. In this game you have the option of getting together with twelve people. To try to get closer to the you can take them out on dates, partake in their club/sport and visit them during special occasions and holidays. In order to beat this game, you will use the three years time to get as close to one of them and make them confess to you at the end (year 9 graduation) under the legendary tree (pictured on the cover of the game behind the characters) that has a myth of every couple that has confessed under that tree has suceeded.
